mapper.select:
SELECT account_no AS accountNo, favorite_photo_account_no AS favoritePhotoAccountNo, favorite_photo_no AS favoritePhotoNo, created_by AS createdBy, created_at AS createdAt FROM photo.photo_favorite
AND account_no = #{accountNo} AND favorite_photo_account_no = #{favoritePhotoAccountNo} AND favorite_photo_no = #{favoritePhotoNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO photo.photo_favorite ( account_no, favorite_photo_account_no, favorite_photo_no, created_by, created_at ) VALUES ( #{accountNo}, #{favoritePhotoAccountNo}, #{favoritePhotoNo}, #{createdBy}, NOW() )
